name: GOTY - FPS Game
description:
Sean Hughes and I (Soren Gerlach) created this game from scratch in Unity. Working together through the entirety of the project. 

The player uses WASD to move around, space to jump, (left) shift to sprint, left mouse button to shoot, f to throw the knife, and g to throw the grenade.

All non-custom assets are listed below: 

Basic FPS controller (multiple modifications were made to this to customize it)- https://gist.github.com/thfm/3ad29421c6ae1de92cba70ff42c9efbb

Pistol Sound - https://freesound.org/people/michorvath/sounds/427594/

AR Sound - https://freesound.org/people/NicJonesAudio/sounds/347596/

Grenade Sound - https://freesound.org/people/Robinhood76/sounds/569685/

Knife Throw Sound - https://freesound.org/people/kylepyke/sounds/196563/

Crash Sound - https://freesound.org/people/Gemesil/sounds/545692/

(Music was custom-made by Soren)

Created by Soren Gerlach & Sean Hughes
